metadata.title: Tuesday, 4th October, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister ofCommunity Development and Social Services
parts: (a) why the Government awarded a contract for the procurement of motor bikes at a high price of over K130,000.00, each;
(b) which companies participated in the tender;
(d) when the contract was signed; and
(e) whether the contract has been cancelled.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) whether the Government had issued any mineral exploration licences in Kasenengwa District;
(b) if so, how many licences were issued;
(c) when the licences were issued; and
(d) what the findings from the explorations were, as of March, 2022.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to create a district in Lumwana area in Mwinilunga District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Supply - Motion (30th September) - Resumption of Debate. ____________________________
